mapper.select: select from t_wh_container_2nd_category as s left join sys_dictionary as syst on s.one_level_type = syst.dic_value AND syst.group_value = 'ONE_LEVEL_TYPE'
select count(*) from t_wh_container_2nd_category as s left join sys_dictionary as syst on s.one_level_type = syst.dic_value AND syst.group_value = 'ONE_LEVEL_TYPE'
mapper.sql: s.id as id, s.category_code as categoryCode, s.category_name as categoryName, s.one_level_type as oneLevelType, s.code_generator as codeGenerator, s.prefix as prefix, s.suffix as suffix, s.length as length, s.width as width, s.high as high, s.volume as volume, s.weight as weight, s.length_grid_num as lengthGridNum, s.width_grid_num as widthGridNum, s.high_grid_num as highGridNum, s.total_grid_num as totalGridNum, s.grid_length as gridLength, s.grid_width as gridWidth, s.grid_high as gridHigh, s.grid_volume as gridVolume, s.picking_mode as pickingMode, s.ou_id as ouId, s.create_time as createTime, s.last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, s.operator_id as operatorId, s.lifecycle as lifecycle, syst.dic_label as oneLevelTypeName
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_container_2nd_category SET category_code = #{categoryCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , category_name = #{categoryName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , one_level_type = #{oneLevelType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , code_generator = #{codeGenerator,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , prefix = #{prefix,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , suffix = #{suffix,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , length = #{length,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , width = #{width,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , high = #{high,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , volume = #{volume,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , weight = #{weight,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , length_grid_num = #{lengthGridNum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , width_grid_num = #{widthGridNum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , high_grid_num = #{highGridNum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , total_grid_num = #{totalGridNum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , grid_length = #{gridLength,javaType=Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , grid_width = #{gridWidth,javaType=Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , grid_high = #{gridHigh,javaType=Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , grid_volume = #{gridVolume,javaType=Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , picking_mode = #{pickingMode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , create_time = #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , last_modify_time = now(), operator_id = #{operatorId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , lifecycle = #{lifecycle,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE id = #{id} and ou_id = #{ouId} and last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime}

UPDATE t_wh_container_2nd_category SET category_code = #{categoryCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , category_name = #{categoryName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , one_level_type = #{oneLevelType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , code_generator = #{codeGenerator,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , prefix = #{prefix,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , suffix = #{suffix,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , length = #{length,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , width = #{width,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , high = #{high,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , volume = #{volume,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , weight = #{weight,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , length_grid_num = #{lengthGridNum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , width_grid_num = #{widthGridNum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , high_grid_num = #{highGridNum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , total_grid_num = #{totalGridNum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , grid_length = #{gridLength,javaType=Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , grid_width = #{gridWidth,javaType=Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , grid_high = #{gridHigh,javaType=Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , grid_volume = #{gridVolume,javaType=Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , picking_mode = #{pickingMode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , create_time = #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , operator_id = #{operatorId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , lifecycle = #{lifecycle,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE id = #{id} and ou_id = #{ouId}
